nodes.text: The CO-0012 com-scan was a product of model of Com-scan manufactured by MicroThrust Processors. The product was used aboard the LAVr QH-7 Chariot and other command speeders. They were used by theater commanders to track enemy movements. It complied and analyzed information fed by forward observer stations, troops, and vehicles. To help communicate among the widely dispersed units, built-in comm encryption stations were used to minimized breaches.
